001001 00000 10000 0000000000000000 	[i as $s0 = 0]
001001 00000 10001 0000000000001010 	[size as $s1 = 10]
001001 00000 10010 0000000000000000 	[sum as $s2 = 0]
001001 00000 10011 0000000000000000 	[pos as $s3 = 0]
001001 00000 10100 0000000000000000 	[neg as $s4 = 0]
001001 00000 10101 arr			[*arr as $s5]

for_start:				[Start of the loop]

000000 01000 10000 10001 00000 101010	[$t0 = i < size]
000100 01000 00000 for_end		[goto for_end $t0 is false]

000000 00000 10000 01001 00010 000000	[$t1 = i << 2]
000000 10101 01001 01010 00000 100000	[$t2 = arr + $t1]
100011 01010 01011 0000000000000000	[lw $t3 0($t2)]
000000 10010 01011 10010 00000 100000	[sum += $t3]

000000 01011 00000 01100 00000 101010	[$t4 = $t3 < 0]
000100 01100 00000 for_if_a		[goto end_if_a if $t4 is false]
000000 10011 01011 10011 00000 100000	[pos += $t3]
end_if_a:				[end of if_a]

000000 00000 01011 01100 00000 101010	[$t4 = $t3 > 0]
000100 01100 00000 for_if_b		[goto end_if_b if $t4 is false]
000000 10100 01011 10100 00000 100000	[neg += $t3]
end_if_b:				[end of if_b]

001000 00000 10000 0000000000000001	[i++]
000010 for_start			[goto the loop start]

for_end:				[End of the loop]

001001 00000 00010 0000000000010001	[Service 17 (exit with value)]
001001 00000 00100 0000000000000000	[Exit value 0]
000000 00000 00000 00000 00000 001100	[Syscall]
